text: @PatrickSvitek @GovAbbott @GovAbbott, TX' Rocket Surgeon to the Deplorables, treated COVID19 as a hoax, in lock-step with @realDonaldTrump. Then said, no worries PLENTY of hoax beds. NOW SAYS RUH-ROH? Fvck him all the way to hell. #AbbottResign #AbbottFailedTexas #AbbottDeathToll
